name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: netflix,動畫瘋 always on top,picture in picture with control-bar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best google extension for watching netflix,making netflix video always on top with control-bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
這個 Google 擴充功能可以讓 Netflix 和 動畫瘋上的影片始終保持在螢幕最上方。
這擴充功能有一個進度條，讓你可以快速播放、快進、倒退、跳到下一集以及調整音量——所有操作都可以在浮動視窗內完成，無需頻繁切換回影片頁面。

快捷鍵
'space' : 播放/暫停
'enter' : 播放/暫停
'right/left' : 快轉/後退
'up/down' : 增加/降低 音量
'm' : 靜音/解除靜音

This Google extension allows videos on Netflix and 動畫瘋 to stay always on top of the screen. 

It includes a "control-bar" that lets you perform actions such as 

1.quick playback, 
2.fast-forwarding, 
3.rewinding, 
4.skipping to the next episode, 
5.adjusting the volume

all within the floating window,
eliminating the need to frequently switch back to the video tab.

user-gesture
'space' : play/pause
'enter' : play/pause
'right/left' : forward/rewind
'up/down' : increase/decrease volume
'm' : mute/unmute
